meanings: only if one does[says] that, only if it is that way, only so, unless so, then
whether someone does something or not

examples.korean: It’s my ideal of what a family home should be. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것이 내가 마땅히 그래야 한다고 생각하는 이상적인 가족생활이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: ‘Do we have to finish this today?’ ‘Yes, you must.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “우리가 오늘 이 일을 끝내야 하나요?” “응, 그래야 해.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Do we have to finish this today?’ ‘Yes, you must.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’m willing to go to court over this if the occasion arises. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그래야 한다면 이 문제를 기꺼이 법정에까지 갖고 갈 생각이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: ‘I’ll have to do it again.’ ‘Too right you will.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook "내가 그걸 다시 해야 할 거야." "틀림없이 그래야 할 거야." Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘I’ll have to do it again.’ ‘Too right you will.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You have to do this if you are an engineer because one millimeter can make a huge impact on the product result. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 엔지니어라면 당연히 그래야 합니다. 1밀리미터의 차이가 생산 결과에 커다란 영향을 미치기 때문입니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: You have to do this if you are an engineer because one millimeter can make a huge impact on the product result. Add to Wordbook
